donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The projects aims to support the ZVPO1 in strengthening climate change governance for Zanzibar through capacity building and mainstreaming of adaptation actions in development plans.

project_descr: The project aims to support the First  Zanzibar Vice President's Office in strengthening climate change governance for Zanzibar through capacity building and mainstreaming of adaptation actions in development plans.
